sentence.Network_en: They would criticize me, or worse yet, pay me no attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会指责我，或者更糟糕的是，干脆对我毫不理睬。

sentence.Network_en: You were quite right to criticize him.
Whenever you criticize him, he always has an excuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 你批评他, 他总有说头儿.

entry.def: If you criticize someone or something, you express your disapproval of them by saying what you think is wrong with them.

example.ex: His mother had rarely criticized him or any of her children...
example.tran: 他母亲很少指责他或她的任何孩子。

example.ex: The minister criticised the police for failing to come up with any leads...
example.tran: 部长批评警方没能找到任何线索。

means.word_mean: 1. find fault with; express criticism of; point out real or perceived flaws;

sentences.sentence: "Those who criticize others often are not perfect, either"

auth_sentence.content: I love America...and...I insist on the right to criticize her.
auth_sentence.res_content: I love America...and...I insist on the right to criticize her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I love America...and...I insist on the right to criticize her.

auth_sentence.content: Don't criticize for the sake of criticizing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't criticize for the sake of criticizing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't criticize for the sake of criticizing.

auth_sentence.content: The U.S. officials declined to criticize the Japanese call for a smaller evacuation zone.
auth_sentence.res_content: The U.S. officials declined to criticize the Japanese call for a smaller evacuation zone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The U.S. officials declined to criticize the Japanese call for a smaller evacuation zone.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

Sentence.sentence: He criticized teachers for failing to recognize that boys are actually more emotional than girls.
She has often been criticized by her boss.

jushi.english: He is a man who does not criticize or reflect.
jushi.chinese: 他是个既不评论也不思考的人。
他批评了我的冒险举动。
